Can't reproduce. BTW, if it does exist, please reassign it to connectivity project since connection profile is managed by them.

I can reproduce this. Existing connection profiles are not persisted on workbench restart.

Kit, pls reassign to connectivity

Rupesh, 

Do you have a stack trace or log for this? We're having a hard time on repro, though I did see it once by chance (and couldn't duplicate after that)?

John,
Below is the stack trace . I am using dtp-sdk_0.9RC4_N051906.zip and  IBM J2RE 1.4.2 on Windows. This may be similar to the XML encoding issue that Brian fixed recently ?
